title: Who Invented The President?
description: Who invented the president? Which country had the first president? We answer presidential questions historical in nature with author Kenneth C. Davis . Also in the episode: why do leaves change color in the fall?
itunes:subtitle: Who invented the president? Which country had the first president? We answer presidential questions historical in nature with author Kenneth C. Davis.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
